    • moveValidator

      public boolean moveValidator​(PlayerMove move)
      Valid the request to move a worker in a specific slot
      Parameters:
      move - The move that contains all the information related to the movement and the target slot
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean who approves or refuses the movement request

      Valid the request to build a new element in a specific slot
      Parameters:
      move - The move that contains all the information related to the new construction and the target slot
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean who approves or refuses the new construction request
